properties.verseOrder: v1 c1 v2 c1 v3 c1 v4 c1 v5 c1 v6 c1

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
I've wandered far
Away from God
Now I'm coming home
The paths of sin
Too long I've trod
Lord I'm coming home

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Coming home
Coming home
Never more to roam
Open wide
Thine arms of love
Lord I'm coming home

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
I've wasted many
Precious years
Now I'm coming home
I now repent
With bitter tears
Lord I'm coming home

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
I'm tired of sin
And straying Lord
Now I'm coming home
I'll trust Thy love
Believe Thy word
Lord I'm coming home

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
My soul is sick
My heart is sore
Now I'm coming home
My strength renew
My hope restore
Lord I'm coming home

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
I need His cleansing
Blood I know
Now I'm coming home
Oh wash me whiter
Than the snow
Lord I'm coming home

verse.name: v6
verse.lines:
My only hope
My only plea
Now I'm coming home
That Jesus died
And died for me
Lord I'm coming home
